tool_description: Returns a list of all US ZIP codes that fall within a defined radius
name: USA ZIP Codes Inside Radius
title: USA ZIP Codes Inside Radius

api_list.name: Search By Latitude & Longitude and Radius
api_list.description: Perform a single radius search with a defined radius and then a location in the form of a ZIP code OR a latitude/longitude.

api_list.name: Search By Centre ZIP and Radius
api_list.description: Perform a single radius search with a defined radius and then a location in the form of a ZIP code OR a latitude/longitude.
